title: Default Value Lost in List Box of Report Parameter After Modification
description: When modifying the default value in a list box of a report parameter, the default value is lost. This issue affects the user experience and should be resolved.
OB: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
EB: Change the Display type to Combo Box, and the expected result should be that "aaa" is the default value. After step 5, the OK button should be grayed out.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create a new report parameter.
2. Set the Display type to List Box.
3. Input three values: "aa", "bb", and "cc". Set "aa" as the default value and click OK.
4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog.
5. Modify "aa" to "aaa" and click OK directly.
6. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog.
